about_the_game: Launch yourself higher and higher in this hardcore platformer. Use your Magne-launcher, a powerful tool that allows you to push yourself and pull yourself through the air. Traverse puzzles, explore scenic areas, learn about what it means to be a Magnesage. Master your Magne-launcher to surmount the toughest obstacles. Only the resilient... only the tenacious... only the insane will reach the top and be granted the rank of Magnesage.
detailed_description: Launch yourself higher and higher in this hardcore platformer. Use your Magne-launcher, a powerful tool that allows you to push yourself and pull yourself through the air. Traverse puzzles, explore scenic areas, learn about what it means to be a Magnesage. Master your Magne-launcher to surmount the toughest obstacles. Only the resilient... only the tenacious... only the insane will reach the top and be granted the rank of Magnesage.
name: Magnecord

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@3.1GHz or AMD R5 1600X @3.5GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 MB available space

short_description: PUSH yourself farther. PULL yourself together. Master the Spheres. Reach for the heavens. Discover what it means to become a Magnesage in this unforgiving platformer with a unique traversal mechanic that's easy to learn, yet hard to master. Your skills will be tested. Master Caelum awaits.
